rev.comment: portal is inactive, and shouldn't be noted at top of page anyway

{{portal|Stargate|Stargate-color.png}}
 
'''''[[Stargate]]'' comics''' are a series of [[comic book]]s based on the science-fiction film [[Stargate (film)|of the same name]], and the TV series ''[[Stargate SG-1]]'' and the spin-off ''[[Stargate Atlantis]]''. The initial comics were [[tie-in]]s with the [[Stargate (film)|film]] and the later output by [[Avatar Press]] has been based on the two TV series.
'''''[[Stargate]]'' comics''' are a series of [[comic book]]s based on the science-fiction film [[Stargate (film)|of the same name]], and the TV series ''[[Stargate SG-1]]'' and the spin-off ''[[Stargate Atlantis]]''. The initial comics were [[tie-in]]s with the [[Stargate (film)|film]] and the later output by [[Avatar Press]] has been based on the two TV series.
